dataSources: Parcel data provided by the Maricopa County Assessor’s Office GIS services.
Supplemental geographic validation provided by the U.S. Census Bureau Geocoder.
phoenix: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Phoenix Planning & Development Department.
mesa: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Mesa Planning Division.
gilbert: Zoning boundaries provided by the Town of Gilbert Planning Division.
scottsdale: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Scottsdale Planning Division.
chandler: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Chandler Planning Division.
glendale: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Glendale Planning Department.
tempe: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Tempe Community Development Department.
peoria: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Peoria Planning Division.
surprise: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Surprise Community Development Department.
avondale: Zoning boundaries provided by the City of Avondale Planning Division.
multipleParcels: ⚠️ Multiple parcels were matched to the provided address. Ensure the correct parcel is selected for this report.
⚠️ Reports based on multiple parcels may require additional validation to confirm zoning and ownership.
unsupportedJurisdiction: ⚠️ This parcel falls within a jurisdiction that is not currently supported by automated zoning integration. Contact the relevant city or county planning department for confirmation.
pucMismatch: ⚠️ The Assessor’s property use code (PUC) does not match the city zoning designation. Confirm with the jurisdiction’s zoning ordinance before proceeding.
splitZoning: ⚠️ This parcel appears to have multiple zoning designations. Review the zoning map carefully to determine applicable restrictions.
centroidUsed: ℹ️ Parcel centroid was used for zoning determination to ensure accuracy when parcel polygon data was available.

dataSources: City sign ordinances obtained from official planning department code libraries.
Jurisdiction verification via municipal websites or clerk’s office.
unsupportedJurisdiction: ⚠️ The jurisdiction is not yet supported for automated sign ordinance checks. Consult the official municipal code.

dataSources: Survey photos collected and processed internally by Christy Signs.
Parcel context verified via Maricopa County GIS.
Custom data sources vary depending on user input and report configuration.
